snippet: Under a new law signed Friday by Gov. Rick Scott, abortions will be illegal in Florida at any point in a woman’s pregnancy if her doctor determines that the fetus could survive outside the womb.
abstract: Florida Gov Rick Scott signs law making abortions illegal in Florida at any point in a woman’s pregnancy if her doctor determines that the fetus could survive outside the womb.
lead_paragraph: Under a new law signed Friday by Gov. Rick Scott, abortions will be illegal in Florida at any point in a woman’s pregnancy if her doctor determines that the fetus could survive outside the womb.

headline.main: Florida: Law Bans Abortion Based on Fetus’s Ability to Survive
headline.print_headline: Florida: Law Bans Abortion Based on Fetus’s Ability to Survive
